job_purpose: Responsible for building new products, enhancing and maintaining existing Service Victoria products and services, working closely with software delivery squads, product, architecture & quality teams.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Work collaboratively in a team to design and build integration solutions
Develop, test, and deploy scalable and reliable integration solutions using nodeJS/React/AWS
Contribute to product planning by providing authoritative advice balancing technical excellence, business objectives, and quality requirements
Develop quality solutions to challenging and complex product requirements
Contribute to the technology strategy including design patterns, library re-use, testing, and deployment techniques
required_qualifications: Good understanding of software engineering principles
Previous experience in a similar role
Ability to work collaboratively in a team
Experience with nodeJS, React, and AWS
Capability to provide authoritative advice on product planning
company_details: DGS was established to improve everyone's experience of doing business and interacting with the Victorian government. They aim to make services easy and seamless for Victorians and businesses by connecting and digitizing systems across state and local government.
